title: Beyond Vaccine Passports | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Shannon Bream | 4/2/21
description:
Vaccine passports could actually be on their way, while celebrities promote the "WELL Health-Safety Seal." MSNBC’s Joe Scarborough claims Christians who don’t get the vaccine are "going out of your way to kill people." Bill O’Reilly talks the news of the week, including Biden’s $2 trillion infrastructure bill, the border, and Georgia’s new voting law. Is KFC doing some woke rebranding? Is anything unbelievable any more? Author Todd Bensman stops by to share his firsthand experience of the crisis at the border. In honor of Good Friday, Glenn has on Fox News anchor Shannon Bream to discuss the trauma Mary must have felt during the crucifixion and what we can learn from her, along with other famous women of the Bible.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
